opinions.title: I just love the Actions
opinions.body: React is riddled with many features that are so unique and interesting to learn

opinions.title: React is amazing!!
opinions.body: I am a music artist, learning react on the side and I found this course absolutely wonderful. I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested in React.

opinions.title: Do yourself a favor and learn React!
opinions.body:
React is an amazing JavaScript library!

Despite all it's shortcomings.

opinions.title: React has more depth than you might first think!
opinions.body:
React is a great library to learn, but it's not just about the basics. Dive deeper!
For example with this course!
